Extraversion.EXT1: I am the life of the party.
Extraversion.EXT4: I talk to a lot of different people at parties.
Extraversion.EXT5: I don't mind being the center of attention.
Extraversion.EXT9: I am energetic when around others.
Extraversion.EXT10: I like being busy with social activities.

Agreeableness.AGR4: I take time out for others.
Agreeableness.AGR6: I make people feel at ease.
Agreeableness.AGR10: I am considerate and kind to almost everyone.

Conscientiousness.CSN3: I get chores done right away.
Conscientiousness.CSN6: I am exacting in my work.
Conscientiousness.CSN9: I am thorough in my work.

Neuroticism.EST5: I change my mood a lot.

Openness.OPN4: I am quick to understand things.
Openness.OPN6: I spend time reflecting on things.
Openness.OPN8: I am good at coming up with novel solutions.
Openness.OPN10: I like to think about complex problems.
